traits.appearance: has a distinctive posture (crooked or rigid)
traits.abilities: is studious, learned, and inquisitive, but is feeble and scrawny

personality.mannerism: Brings up anecdotal backstory as examples to conversation Eg. 'Hey that reminds me of the time I-'
personality.interaction: has a hot temper around the Party

voice.vocals: Speaks Quickly, at a Normal pitch.
voice.quirk: Heavy lisp on Th and S (th-ufferin th-uckertash!)
